legal_page.security_paragraph: While AKIOS implements strong containment (kernel sandbox, syscall interception, PII redaction, cost kills, Merkle audit), no software can guarantee absolute security.
legal_page.compliance_paragraph: AKIOS Open Runtime provides technical foundations for data protection and auditability (for example, PII redaction and Merkle-style ledgers), but does not guarantee compliance with any regulation (EU AI Act, GDPR, HDS, or others).
legal_page.compliance_note: Compliance is the user's responsibility. For regulated or high-risk use (including EU AI Act high-risk systems), ensure your own controls and certifications and seek expert advice.
legal_page.export_paragraph: AKIOS is subject to applicable export control laws. Users are responsible for compliance with all relevant regulations.
legal_page.law_paragraph: French law applies. Jurisdiction: Paris courts.
legal_page.summary_paragraph: AKIOS is free open-source software (GPL-3) provided "as is" with no warranties — use it responsibly and secure your own environment.

legal_page.security_paragraph: Bien qu'AKIOS mette en œuvre une forte isolation (sandbox noyau, interception des appels système, rédaction des PII, limites de coût, audit Merkle), aucun logiciel ne peut garantir une sécurité absolue.

legal_page.security_must_item_2: Valider les sorties et les traces d'audit
legal_page.security_must_item_3: Suivre les bonnes pratiques de sécurité
legal_page.security_must_item_4: Signaler les vulnérabilités de manière responsable (security@akioud.ai)
legal_page.compliance_paragraph: AKIOS Open Runtime fournit des briques techniques pour la protection des données et l'auditabilité (par exemple, rédaction des PII et registres de type Merkle), mais ne garantit pas la conformité à une quelconque réglementation (EU AI Act, RGPD, HDS ou autres).
